item.title: By: Veee
item.dc:creator: Veee
item.description: Absolutely Stellar Customer Service, had a small issue but was on the phone with someone within 5 minutes and the return was processed within 15 minutes. I signed up on here just to leave the 5 star review
item.content:encoded: Absolutely Stellar Customer Service, had a small issue but was on the phone with someone within 5 minutes and the return was processed within 15 minutes. I signed up on here just to leave the 5 star review

item.title: By: PhillyPhan!
item.dc:creator: PhillyPhan!
item.description: easy to assemble, easy to pack. really fun at the park where there is plenty of room. great upgrade for the basic hoverboard model.
item.content:encoded: easy to assemble, easy to pack. really fun at the park where there is plenty of room. great upgrade for the basic hoverboard model.

item.title: By: skiingstefi
item.dc:creator: skiingstefi
item.description: I wasn't sure about this because my daughter only rides her hoverboard a little but this ended up being the perfect upgrade. Now her little brother is always stealing her hoverboard and kart!! It's really safe too! Get this if you have a hoverboard!!
item.content:encoded: I wasn’t sure about this because my daughter only rides her hoverboard a little but this ended up being the perfect upgrade. Now her little brother is always stealing her hoverboard and kart!! It’s really safe too! Get this if you have a hoverboard!!

item.title: By: Rylanv80
item.dc:creator: Rylanv80
item.description: Go kart is working great so far. Take s a little getting used to and the front wheel could be bigger but it's a fun way to ride the hoverboard
item.content:encoded: Go kart is working great so far. Take s a little getting used to and the front wheel could be bigger but it’s a fun way to ride the hoverboard

item.title: By: bydesignmaven
item.dc:creator: bydesignmaven
item.description: All in all this is a good buy and almost a must-have if you get the hover board. Kids love it and I was surprised I could ride it too.
item.content:encoded: All in all this is a good buy and almost a must-have if you get the hover board. Kids love it and I was surprised I could ride it too.

item.title: By: MarkCO
item.dc:creator: MarkCO
item.description: Quick and easy to put together and use with the hover board.
item.content:encoded: Quick and easy to put together and use with the hover board.

item.title: By: lucas h.
item.dc:creator: lucas h.
item.description: fun to play with and the box arrived fast.
item.content:encoded: fun to play with and the box arrived fast.

item.title: By: Candy
item.dc:creator: Candy
item.description: Great add on for anyone who owns a hoverboard. Make sure you have plenty of space as this thing goes fast.
item.content:encoded: Great add on for anyone who owns a hoverboard. Make sure you have plenty of space as this thing goes fast.
